kulami.control

Class DisplayFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.control.DisplayFlags

  • public class DisplayFlags
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a wrapper for display settings that the user can choose to turn on or off during a game.
    Author:
    gordon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean panelPossession 
      private boolean possibleMoves 
      private boolean previousMoves 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisplayFlags()
      Default constructor which sets all flags to false.
      DisplayFlags(boolean previousMoves, boolean possibleMoves, boolean panelPossession)
      Construct a DisplayFlags object and initialize flags to chosen values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayFlags

        public DisplayFlags()
        Default constructor which sets all flags to false.

      • DisplayFlags

        DisplayFlags(boolean previousMoves,
            boolean possibleMoves,
            boolean panelPossession)
        Construct a DisplayFlags object and initialize flags to chosen values.

        Only the controller should call this constructor.

        Parameters:
        previousMoves - display previous moves?
        possibleMoves - display currently legal moves?
        panelPossession - display current owners of each panel?
